charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1-3)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 68 months to run concurrently; Supervised Release; 36 months to run concurrentlly; Special Assessment: $300; Restitution: $3,527.00. UPDATED 1/4/2011 - Supervised Release is REINSTATED upon the original terms and conditions set forth in the Judgment entered on September 1, 2005. SUPERVISED RELEASE REVOKED 10/29/2012: Imprisonment: 6 months to run consecutively with any term of imprisonment imposed in case number 2012-CF-008828A, Duval County Circuit Court. After confinement, Defendant is discharged from further jurisdiction of this Court in this case.
